job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtWere looking for a Data Scientist for a music creation platform working to change the way we think about the ecosystem of music creation and production making it easier and more affordable for anyone at any skill level to create music at the touch of a buttonltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis role requires is a specific skillset focused on learning scale and agility in the music tech space but we know youre out thereltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWere open to candidates from all over the US  ideally youd want to relocate to San Diego but happy to have a conversation about the best scenarioltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt BenefitsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtIndustryleading healthcare covering medical dental vision and life paid by the companyltligtltligtHealth Savings and Flexible Spending accountsltligtltligt401KltligtltligtUnlimited PTO with an employeefocused work approachltligtltligtFlexible work schedule and a remotefriendly environmentltligtltligtParental leaveltligtltligtParticipation in profit sharingltligtltligt200 Pay on your BirthdayltligtltligtEmployee Referral Bonus ProgramltligtltligtMaternity Leave ProgramltligtltligtCompany outings retreats and events when permissibleltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCollect analyze and present processed and unprocessed data pertaining to music creation tech to make the business more powerful and increase enterprise opportunities To be honest the right person can probably better tell us how this role should work And well happily empower you to do thatltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithms in pertinence to business objectivesltligtltligtCollaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production make product adjustments and geek out on product opportunities GET FIRED UP sorryltligtltligtBased on the insights you gather make clear recommendations to improve and work with other department leads to executeltligtltligtHelp design data team hiring roadmapsltligtltligtProduce regular analytics reports for internal and external stakeholder board investor etc purposesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirements and some nicetohavesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors in statistics comp sci math engineeringltligtltligtDeep MLAI experience including machine learning modeling and ensemble methodologyltligtltligtPython expertise NumPy SciPy SQL MongoDB CltligtltligtUnderstanding of digital signal processing techniques filtering spectralFFT analysis convolution etcltligtltligtExperience with machine learning especially as it applies to music analysis andor generationltligtltligtExperience with the following technologies Django Heroku AWS S3ltligtltligtFamiliarity with python audio processing libraries such as LibrosaltligtltligtPassion for or experience in music  ML production and creationltligtltulgt
